sentences.en: Asbestos can be used to insulate a cooking stove.
sentences.cn: 石棉能用来使烹调用的炉灶绝热.

sentences.en: Don't insulate your mother from everyday difficulties even if she is old.
sentences.cn: 不要使你母亲经常脱离日常的困难,尽管她已经老了.

sentences.en: Double - glazing of windows helps to insulate the house from the cold weather.
sentences.cn: 给窗户装上双层玻璃有助于房子与严寒的气候绝缘.

sentences.en: He continues to insulate his country from the contagion of foreign ideas.
sentences.cn: 他继续使本国远离外来思想的侵袭。

sentences.en: Home owners are being encouraged to insulate their homes to save energy.
sentences.cn: 当局鼓励房主给住房加隔热装置以节约能源。

sentences.en: Is there any way we can insulate our home from the noise?
sentences.cn: 有什么办法可以使我们的住宅隔音吗？

sentences.en: It would be wrong to assume that rich countries will always be able to insulate themselves with drugs against the ravages of new diseases.
sentences.cn: 要是以为富国总能为自己备好药物以抵御新发疾病的侵害，那就错了。

sentences.en: Living in a high building tends to insulate us from the real life of the city.
sentences.cn: 住在高楼大厦中容易使我们与城市的现实生活相隔绝.

sentences.en: Ocean freight is approximately $ 28.00 for the insulate board, and $ 10.00 for the standard hardboard, per 1,000 square feet.
sentences.cn: 海上运费, 每1000平方英尺绝缘板约28美元, 标准硬质纤维板为10美元.

sentences.en: Pipes may need insulating against the cold.
sentences.cn: 管道可能需要隔温以防冰冻。

sentences.en: Please insulate the furnace from any wood.
sentences.cn: 请把这个炉子远离木头.

sentences.en: Rubber is used to insulate electric wires.
sentences.cn: 橡胶被用来使电线与外界绝缘.

sentences.en: The ceiling tiles help to insulate a room.
sentences.cn: 那天花板瓦能使房间隔热.

sentences.en: The function of a mammal's fur is to insulate the body.
sentences.cn: 哺乳动物皮毛的功能在于使身体保温.

sentences.en: They have found a way to insulate themselves against the cost of inflation.
sentences.cn: 他们找到了使自己免受通货膨胀影响的办法.

sentences.en: They wonder if their community is no longer insulated from big city problems.
sentences.cn: 他们想知道他们的社区是否不再与那些大城市的问题隔离。

sentences.en: Variable levies can insulate farmers and consumers from world markets.
sentences.cn: 差价进口税可以把农民和消费者与世界市场隔离开来.

words.tran_cn: 孤立的；与世隔绝的；海岛的；岛民的
[物] 绝缘体；从事绝缘工作的工人

trans.tran_en: to cover or protect something with a material that stops electricity, sound, heat etc from getting in or out

trans.tran_cn: 使隔离，使孤立，使绝缘，使隔热
trans.tran_en: to cover or protect something with a material that stops electricity, sound, heat etc from getting in or out
